tossup_question: -   –  What term is used to describe breaks in strata that represent periods during which deposition of sediments ceased and erosion removed previously formed rocks?
bonus_question: -   –  By which of the following mechanisms do pulsar magnetic fields emit gamma rays?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Nuclear fission
X)Compton scattering
Y)Cyclotron radiation
Z)Synchrotron radiation
